data.event: It was created on 18 January 1897 by Federico Err√°zuriz Echaurren.

event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Rinconada spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Rinconada spans an area of 122.5 km2 (47 sq mi) and has 6,692 inhabitants (3,429 men and 3,263 women).
The population grew by 16.1% (927 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, Rinconada is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
